      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        A method to initialize various items in the UI, called first before anything Includes LOGGER initialisation:

        logging for this class is stored in the file specified by the static variable at the top of the class code. Current level of data stored is INFO. Typically fine and lower are used for script calls, info is for function or method start and end.

        The console is used (with a level of SEVERE in the event that the FileHandler can not be created)

      • initializeTableView
